      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> fields,
                                        java.lang.String clsName)
        Returns a string representing an object as a simple field list. Doesn't pay attention to string formatting or quote escaping; you get what you get.

      • toHashMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> toHashMap(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                                             java.lang.Class cls)
        Get the declared field values for the given object at the given class level. Shallow.
        Parameters:
        obj - -- object to fetch fields from
        cls - -- class level to fetch for
        Returns:
